title.narrative: Commercialization of Biofortified Crops for Improved Nutrition
Kommerzialisierung biofortifizierter Pflanzen für bessere Ernährung

description.narrative: Improve access to inputs and markets for biofortified seeds and food products; generate demand for these nutrient rich staple crops using a demand creation approach that taps into the rational and emitional drives of consumers choices for nutrient rich staples; improve the enabling environmenr for biofortified seeds and food products through advocacy, catalytic financif, and technology licencing services
